msbt.message: Today's the day we get to give candy and stuff to folks who make us feel good. So I got you a buncha chocolates! Then I gave 'em a big ol' happy hug so they're packed with my good feels.

Did you know feelings can actually make chocolate taste better? It's science. Chocolaty science. Which is the best kind of science! That's why I packed these chocolates all fulla my happiness. 'Cause flavor!
Valentine's Day is the day you're supposed to send gifts to your favorite folks, and 'cause you're one of my favoritest folks, I'm sending you a special gift 'cause it's Valentine's Day!

Someone said Valentine's Day is when I've gotta tell everyone how I feel about them, so here goes... You make me happy, and I'm glad you're my friend. Also! Writing that made me happy. And kinda hungry.

Yesterday I was thinking about how fun it is to chat and hang out with folks, and it made me think of how fun you are to chat and hang out with! So then I got you a gift for Valentine's Day and wrote this.
Wanna know how great I think you are? I bought chocolates for you, and I only took one nibble before I sent 'em. One! Huh...that sounds real grown-up now that I've written it out like that.
Ah huh huh huh huh...huh huh huh huh huh huh huh. Ah huh! Huh huh huh, huh huh? Huh. Huh huh. Ah huh huh huh huh huh—huh huh! AHH HUH HUH HUH! Huh huh huh... Huh— Happy Valentine's Day!

If this letter smells kinda funny, it's 'cause I've had it under my pillow for weeks. I wanted it to soak up all my happy thoughts of you, but, uh...it soaked up my smells too. Oh well. Happy Valentine's Day!
OK, I get that Valentine's Day is about telling special folks in your life how you feel, but...why do you wanna know I feel sleepy right now? Oh well! I told you, and that means you're special to me.
